Class AbstractConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.wicast.AbstractConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractConfigTest.MockConfig, ClientConfig, Config, ServerConfig

    public abstract class AbstractConfig
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigInterface
    An Abstract Configuration Class for holding the Configuration from XML.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractConfig

        public AbstractConfig()
        default Constructor. loads the default configuration from jar, then loads override configuration from a file. with the same filename as classname + ".xml".
